subject: Batch 1: Add metadata to 7 SKILL.md files (with YAML frontmatter)
description:
Add `metadata` field to the YAML frontmatter of the following 7 SKILL.md files. Each file has existing `---` delimited YAML frontmatter.

For each file:
1. Read the file
2. Check if `metadata` field already exists -- if so, skip
3. Find the closing `---` of the frontmatter and replace it with:
```
metadata:
  author: masaaki-nagasawa
  version: 1.0.0
---
```
4. Do NOT change any other content

Files to process:
1. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/coding-standards/SKILL.md
2. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/csv-format-converter/SKILL.md
3. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/debugging-guide/SKILL.md
4. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/fe-be-advanced/SKILL.md
5. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/fe-be-integration/SKILL.md
6. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/fe-be-phase1-4/SKILL.md
7. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/fe-be-phase5-9/SKILL.md

Report each file processed with success/skip/error status.
